forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this evening will become intermittent overnight. Low 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this evening will become rain and snow showers overnight. Low 33F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 1C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 34F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with snow likely in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with snow likely in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low around 30F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the morning. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low near 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 13F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 11F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 12F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few snow showers during the afternoon. High near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early. A few snow showers developing later in the day. High 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low -9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low 16F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.
